p1: For representative telephone surveys, CMR uses the sample and telephone number databases provided by the "ADM Telephone Samples Association". This ensures that households whose telephone numbers are not registered can be reached (keyword: random generation).

Vor jeder Studie findet zusätzlich eine: Our interviewers are constantly trained in content and technology. Before each study, the studio management also provides a questionnaire briefing to point out special features and sensitize the interviewers to relevant issues.

Es ist immer mit einer Studioleitung un: Our telephone studio has 60 CATI stations. It is always staffed by a studio manager and assistant as well as six supervisors, each of whom oversees 10 CATI stations.

Ein zusätzliches Monitoring ermöglicht: We work with the software system “Voxco”, which allows both complicated sampling and complex questionnaire control and programming. In order to create synergies, we have installed a predictive dialer with a program tailored to our needs. As soon as an interviewer has finished an interview, the system puts them through to the next call. There is no need to dial for long periods and wait to see if a line is free, as the dialer recognizes, for example, answering machines or busy signals. The interviewer can concentrate fully on the person they are talking to and not on the technology. In addition to the powerful call management, the system also includes field and quota management and reporting functions. Additional monitoring allows supervisors to follow each interview.
